title: Will each ranked border be different per rank tier?
body: For example, will you be able to tell whether or not someone placed in Gold 1 vs Gold 5, or Platinum 1 vs Platinum 5 simply based on their ranked border? Or will Gold 1 and Gold 5 have the same ranked border? No one answered me on the support page, but I'm assuming it's the latter.

replies.body: From everything I've seen so far this season, it looks like all the Gold borders will look the same but the icons seem to show the individual tier 1-5.
I think its the other way around. The borders from 1-5 are different but the icons are the same for each rank
